title: Hair Ornament, "Hair ornament in the form of a caduceus", ca. 1875
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors
description: Hair ornament in the form a caduceus (wand of the god Mercury), with two winged, entwined dragon heads in gold on a tapering ivory shaft.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hair Ornament, "Hair ornament in the form of a caduceus", ca. 1875.
ca. 1875. Gold, ivory. Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. 1969-40-83.
